text: Godou huwa laagau ga logowaahee gei goodou ga hadihadi godou huwa ‘wheat’, gaa dae loo gi di madagoaa e hadi ai nia golee waini. Goodou ga hadihadi godou golee waini gaa dae loo gi di madagoaa e haga nonnono ai godou hadu ‘wheat’. Goodou ga hai mee gi nia mee ala e hiihai ginai goodou e gai, gei goodou ga mouli humalia i lodo di godou lohongo.26.5 Deuteronomy 11.13-15; 28.1-14
